description: Experts probe Pacific waters off Kamchatka after dead animals washed ashore and residents fell ill.
title: Kamchatka: Pollution killing sea life in Russian far east
title_page: Kamchatka: Pollution killing sea life in Russian far east - BBC News
maintext: "We began to see that something was wrong with the water because after an ordinary surf you come out feeling good, but this time it felt like we had burned eyes, we couldn't even see straight," local surfer Rasul Gadzhiev said.
